Topic Hierarchy: Cybersecurity > Penetration Testing And Ethical Hacking > Penetration Testing Types > 005_Compliance-Driven Testing Categories > Industry-Specific Compliance Testing > CCPA Privacy Compliance Assessment. Use this FULL content context: [Insert all scaffolding_layers content here, including concept map, NIST expansions (CSF: Identify-Protect-Detect-Respond-Recover; Privacy Framework: privacy risk mgmt), real-world examples (Uber), sources (qualysec.com, secureframe.com, nist.gov, oag.ca.gov)]. Incorporate: - Learning Objectives: [paste learning_objectives array]. - Active Learning: Embed references (e.g., 'Relates to peer-teaching on rights'). Generate flashcards following EXACT schema: [paste flashcard_generation_schema.structure, distractor_protocol, explanation_requirements]. Output ONLY in JSON: {'flashcards': [array of objects, each {'front': str, 'back': {'answer': str, 'explanation': str, 'distractors': array (if MCQ)}, 'tags': array}]}. Ensure 10 per Bloom's level, balanced layers, high pedagogical value (scaffolded progression, voter-approved completeness).
